NAEB HEADQUARTERS
APR 2 3 1961
A
1
P. 0. BOX •
SACRAMENTO#, CALIFORNIA •
• WAbash 2-6563
April 24, 1961
Mr. Harold Hill
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
13^6 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D.C.
Dear Harold:
With reference to your telegram. Governor Brown was pre¬
pared to reply to Congressman Harris at the time of your
earlier notification of a possible inquiry from him.
However, the Governor did not hear from Harris and there¬
fore did not forward his statement.
I contacted the Governor on April 21st and urged that his
statement go forward even without the request from Harris.
I am advised that the Governor's office has taken this
action. If you should discover that you have not heard
from Governor Brown please let me know right away and I
will follow up on the matter.
Cordially,
Crabbe
Manager
JCC/db
